BadgeDetail.Name: Sports Leader
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they are ready to lead sports events and activities independently as well as in a team.

Task.Title: The main event
Task.Body: Upload the supporting documentation used to plan and review a sports event, as well as a 1 minute video of your performance during the delivery.
